channel.title: ::news
channel.description: i'm trying to make a command using ::news, and it pops out some letter or something and says the recent news on the server and stuff. Can anybody give me the code?

item.title: ::news
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

This would be called an interface, you would need a code like this:

public void news() { //grey patterned interface clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Close Window", 3024);//Close Text sendQuest("", 3026);//Line 1 sendQuest("", 3027);//Line 2 sendQuest("", 3028);//Line 3 sendQuest("", 3029);//Line 4 sendQuest("", 3030);//Line 5 sendQuest("", 3031);//Line 6 sendQuest("", 3032);//Line 7 sendQuest("", 3033);//Line 8 sendQuest("", 3034);//Line 9 sendQuest("", 3035);//Line 10 sendQuest("", 3036);//Line 11 sendQuest("", 3037);//Line 12 sendQuest("", 3038); sendQuest("", 3039); sendQuest("", 3040); sendQuest("", 3041); showInterface(3023); flushOutStream(); }

Read full topic
